(nation park) larg saguaro rincon district locat pima county, arizona, unit state nearest&#160;c tucson coordin 32°15′0″n 110°30′0″w﻿ / ﻿32.25000°n 110.50000°w﻿ / 32.25000; -110.50000coordinates: 32°15′0″n 110°30′0″w﻿ / ﻿32.25000°n 110.50000°w﻿ / 32.25000; -110.50000 area 91,442 acr (37,005&#160;ha)[1] establish octob 14, 1994[2] visitor 610,045 (in&#160;2011)[3] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic http://www.nps.gov/sagu/index.htm saguaro nation park locat southern arizona outskirt tucson part unit state nation park system. park preserv desert landscape, fauna flora contain within two park sections, one east west tucson. park establish protect namesake—th giant saguaro cactu (carnegiea gigantea). saguaro park near northernmost limit natur surviv zone within sonoran desert. content 1 overview 2 rincon mountain district (saguaro park east) 3 tucson mountain district (saguaro park west) 4 galleri imag 5 see also 6 note 7 extern link overview[edit] park divid two sections, call districts, lie approxim 20 mile (32&#160;km) east 15 mile (24&#160;km) west center citi tucson, arizona. total area 2011 91,442 acr (37,005&#160;ha)[1] 70,905 acr (28,694&#160;ha) design wilderness.[4] visitor center two districts. easili reach car tucson, public transport park. district conserv fine tract sonoran desert, includ rang signific hills, tucson mountain west rincon mountain east. park get name saguaro, larg cactu nativ region. mani kind cactus, includ barrel, cholla, prickli pear, abund park. one endang animal, lesser long-nos bat, live park part year migration, togeth one threaten species, mexican spot owl. saguaro nation monument creat march 1, 1933 presid herbert hoover.[5] octob 14, 1994, congress elev saguaro nation park status.[2] facil park includ 150 mile (240&#160;km) well mark maintain hike trails, shorter walk trail interpret inform available. backcountri hike advis hot summer months. rincon mountain district (saguaro park east)[edit] rincon mountain district locat eastern edg tucson, includ land protect origin nation monument. plant commun lower elev park typic sonoran desert, rincon mountain support temper conifer forest. highest peak rang mica mountain, elev 8,664 feet (2,641&#160;m).[6] side park fewer saguaro western counterpart, larger size due higher amount rainfal runoff rincon mountains. key featur district 8.3-mile (13.4&#160;km) cactu forest loop drive, provid access two picnic area central trails. hike side park readili access visitors. trailhead present east end speedway broadway popular equestrians, especi weekends. park' loop road sever addit trailheads. visitor center suppli map hike trail park. southern boundari park hope camp trails, also popular equestrians. access hope camp trail found end camino loma alta. road paved, except last 200 yard so. section park ad 1991 unit state congress author purchas addit 4,011 acr (1,623&#160;ha). campground access road park rincon mountain district open backcountri camp design sites. site closest road dougla spring campground, requit 5.9-mile (9.5&#160;km) hike. wilder permit requir overnight stays. fee permit $6.00 per campsite, per night.[7] overnight accommod recreat vehicl park, facil avail coloss cave mountain park ten mile (16&#160;km) south rincon district visitor center old spanish trail. panorama, saguaro nation park tucson mountain district (saguaro park west)[edit] hohokam petroglyph kinney road pictur rock road intersect saguaro nation park west. tucson mountain one four mountain rang surround tucson. saguaro cactu nativ area found exclus sonoran desert.[8] saguaro grow except slow rate. first arm saguaro typic start grow sometim 50 70 year age though may closer 100 year locat precipit low.[9] hohokam petroglyph etch larg stone resid saguaro park west. asid histor petroglyph impos saguaro cacti, desert wildlif abundant. coyotes, roadrunner, jack rabbit quail anim call park home.[10] galleri images[edit]
